BASICS

"TIGHT" LISTS ARE RENDERED WITH CLASS "LI"
.
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
2. Item 3
.
<p class="li">1. Item 1</p>
<p class="li">2. Item 2</p>
<p class="li">2. Item 3</p>
.

.
- Item 1
* Item 2
.
<p class="li">- Item 1</p>
<p class="li">* Item 2</p>
.

.
- Item 1
  - Item 1a
- Item 2
    - Item 2a
.
<p class="li">- Item 1</p>
<p class="li li2">- Item 1a</p>
<p class="li">- Item 2</p>
<p class="li li2">- Item 2a</p>
.

"LOOSE" LISTS ARE RENDERED AS FLAT PARAGRAPHS
.
1. Item 1

2. Item 2

2. Item 3
.
<p>1. Item 1</p>
<p>2. Item 2</p>
<p>2. Item 3</p>
.

.
- Item 1

- Item 2
.
<p>- Item 1</p>
<p>- Item 2</p>
.

.
- Item 1

- Item 2

    - Item 2a
.
<p>- Item 1</p>
<p>- Item 2</p>
<p class="l2">- Item 2a</p>
.

.
1. Paragraph text.

2. Paragraph text.

   1. Paragraph text.
.
<p>1. Paragraph text.</p>
<p>2. Paragraph text.</p>
<p class="l2">1. Paragraph text.</p>
.

HANGING INDENTATION IS SUPPORTED
.
1.  Item 1
    with a hanging indent

 -  Item 1
    with a hanging indent
.
<p>1. Item 1
with a hanging indent</p>
<p>- Item 1
with a hanging indent</p>
.

(also with <4 spaces)
.
- This is a list paragraph
  with hanging indentation;
  it should be rendered as
  a single paragraph, since
  the indent is 2 spaces.
.
<p>- This is a list paragraph
with hanging indentation;
it should be rendered as
a single paragraph, since
the indent is 2 spaces.</p>
.

BLANK LINES
.
-   
  foo
.
<p>- foo</p>
.

EMPTY LIST ITEMS
.
-

  foo
.
<p>-</p>
<p>foo</p>
.

.
- foo
-
- bar
.
<p class="li">- foo</p>
<p class="li">-</p>
<p class="li">- bar</p>
.

.
- foo
-   
- bar
.
<p class="li">- foo</p>
<p class="li">-</p>
<p class="li">- bar</p>
.

.
1. foo
2.
3. bar
.
<p class="li">1. foo</p>
<p class="li">2.</p>
<p class="li">3. bar</p>
.

.
*
.
<p>*</p>
.

SEPARATION FROM PREVIOUS PARAGRAPHS
.
Foo
- bar
- baz
.
<p>Foo
- bar
- baz</p>
.

Unlike in Commonmark, lists can not break paragraphs.
.
The number of windows in my house is
1.  The number of doors is 6.
.
<p>The number of windows in my house is
1. The number of doors is 6.</p>
.

Tight lists must be separated from the previous paragraph by a blank line
.
Paragraph text
- not a list
- just more paragraph

Paragraph text

- Item 1
- Item 2
.
<p>Paragraph text
- not a list
- just more paragraph</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="li">- Item 1</p>
<p class="li">- Item 2</p>
.

HEADINGS IN LIST ITEMS ARE NOT SUPPORTED
.
- # Foo
- Bar
---
  baz
.
<p class="li">- # Foo</p>
<p class="li">- Bar</p>
<hr>
<p>baz</p>
.

LIST ITEMS WITH MULTIPLE PARAGRAPHS ARE NOT SUPPORTED
.
  - foo

    bar
.
<p>- foo</p>
<pre><code>bar</code></pre>
.

.
  - foo

	bar
.
<p>- foo</p>
<pre><code>bar</code></pre>
.

(this would be a two-paragraph list item in Commonmark)
.
- one

  two
.
<p>- one</p>
<p>two</p>
.

(and this as well)
.
 -    one

      two
.
<p>-    one</p>
<pre><code>  two</code></pre>
.

(even if indented by extra spaces)
.
-  foo

   bar
.
<p>-  foo</p>
<p>bar</p>
.

(even if separated by multiple blank lines)
.
- foo


  bar
.
<p>- foo</p>
<p>bar</p>
.

(even if nested)
.
- a
  - b

    c
- d
.
<p class="li">- a</p>
<p class="li li2">- b</p>
<pre><code>c</code></pre>
<p>- d</p>
.

LIST ITEMS WITH MULTIPLE INTERNAL ELEMENTS
.
1.  A paragraph
    with two lines.

        indented code

    > A block quote.
.
<p>1. A paragraph
with two lines.</p>
<pre><code>    indented code
</code></pre>
<pre><code>> A block quote.
</code></pre>
.

.
- foo

		bar
.
<p>- foo</p>
<pre><code>    bar
</code></pre>
.

.
1.  foo

    ```
    bar
    ```

    baz

    > bam
.
<p>1.  foo</p>
<pre><code>```
bar
```
</code></pre>
<pre><code>baz
</code></pre>
<pre><code>> bam
</code></pre>
.

(funky indentation: the second item is part of the first list item in Commonmark)
.
   > > 1.  one
>>
>>     two
.
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>1.  one</p>
<pre><code>two
</pre></code>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
.

(funky indentation: the second item is NOT part of the first list item in Commonmark)
.
>>- one
>>
  >  > two
.
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>- one</p>
<p>two</p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
.

(indented code and paragraphs)
.
1.     indented code

   paragraph

       more code
.
<p>1.     indented code</p>
<p>paragraph</p>
<pre><code>   more code
</code></pre>
.

LAZY NESTED STRUCTURES
.
> 1. > Blockquote
continued here.
.
<blockquote>
<p>1. > Blockquote
continued here.</p>
</blockquote>
.

.
- - foo
.
<p>- - foo</p>
.

.
1. - 2. foo
.
<p>1. - 2. foo</p>
.

INDENTATION WITHIN LIST ITEMS
.
*     This is code in Commonmark.
.
<p>*     This is code in Commonmark.</p>
.

.
-		foo
.
<p>-		foo</p>
.

.
 *  List item
    with hanging indent
        and a further indent
.
let's just see what happens
.

ATTRIBUTES
.
- Item 1 {.test}
- Item 2 {.test}
.
<p class="li test">- Item 1</p>
<p class="li test">- Item 2</p>
.

.
- Item 1 {.test}

- Item 2 {.test}
.
<p class="test">- Item 1</p>
<p class="test">- Item 2</p>
.

.
- Item 1
- Item 2
  {.test}
.
<p class="li">- Item 1</p>
<p class="li test">- Item 2</p>
.

.
- Item 1
- Item 2
{.test}
.
let's just see what happens
.
